dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO') ship_to_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO','3')) ship_to_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO')) ship_to_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER') transloader_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER','3')) transloader_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER')) transloader_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR') consolidator_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR','3')) consolidator_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR')) consolidator_city_state_zip, cc1.country_name source_loc_country, sref1.shipment_refnum_value place_of_delivery, s.attribute2 hs_code, TRIM((SELECT listagg (ssunit.tag_3, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ssunit.tag_3) FROM s_ship_unit ssunit INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON ssunit.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid)) containers, 'TSFE' || j.job_xid bill_lading, cont1.company_name carrier, j.attribute5 master_bill_lading, 'TSFE' || j.job_xid ams_number, TRIM(cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value || ' ' || cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value) feeder_vessel_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place_loc(s.shipment_gid,cv.charter_voyage_gid,'CHARTER_VOYAGE','SCOULAR.VIA_LOCATION_ID', cv.source_location_gid) feeder_vessel_load_port, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YY') feeder_vessel_etd, (CASE WHEN sref2.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN sref3.shipment_refnum_value ELSE sref2.shipment_refnum_value END) voyage_name, (CASE WHEN (SELECT loc.location_gid FROM location loc INNER JOIN country_code cc ON loc.country_code3_gid = cc.country_code3_gid WHERE loc.location_gid = 'SCOULAR.' || REPLACE(cvr5.charter_voyage_refnum_value,'SCOULAR.','')) IS NULL THEN cvr5.charter_voyage_refnum_value ELSE (SELECT loc.city || ', ' || cc.country_name FROM location loc INNER JOIN country_code cc ON loc.country_code3_gid = cc.country_code3_gid WHERE loc.location_gid = 'SCOULAR.' || REPLACE(cvr5.charter_voyage_refnum_value,'SCOULAR.','')) END) load_port, cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value mother_vessel_etd, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place_loc_pr(s.shipment_gid,cv.charter_voyage_gid,'CHARTER_VOYAGE','SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VIA_PORT_OF_DISCHARGE', cv.dest_location_gid) discharge_port, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YY') arrival_date FROM job j LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND vsor.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT sh.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh WHERE vsor.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND sh.is_primary = 'Y' AND sh.perspective = 'B') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.perspective = 'B' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN vessel v ON cv.vessel_gid = v.vessel_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_FEEDER VESSEL NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_FEEDER VOYAGE NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr3 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr3.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_TRANSHIP PORT DEPARTURE DATE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr4 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr4.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr4.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr5 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr5.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr5.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_TRANSHIP PORT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.PLACE OF DELIVERY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.VESSEL_VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.BOOKING_VESSEL_VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact cont1 ON cv.servprov_gid = cont1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l1 ON s.source_location_gid = l1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc1 ON l1.country_code3_gid = cc1.country_code3_gid WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT DISTINCT NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO'), 'Data Missing in System') ship_to_name, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO','3')), 'Data Missing in System') ship_to_address, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIP TO')), 'Data Missing in System') ship_to_city_state_zip, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER'), 'Data Missing in System') transloader_name, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER','3')), 'Data Missing in System') transloader_address, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONTAINER STUFFER')), 'Data Missing in System') transloader_city_state_zip, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR'), 'Data Missing in System') consolidator_name, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR','3')), 'Data Missing in System') consolidator_address, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','CONSOLIDATOR')), 'Data Missing in System') consolidator_city_state_zip, NVL(cc1.country_name, 'Data Missing in System') source_loc_country, NVL(sref1.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') place_of_delivery, NVL(s.attribute2, 'Data Missing in System') hs_code, NVL(TRIM((SELECT listagg (ssunit.tag_3, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ssunit.tag_3) FROM s_ship_unit ssunit INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON ssunit.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid)), 'Data Missing in System') containers, 'TSFE' || NVL(j.job_xid, ' Data Missing in System') bill_lading, NVL(cont1.company_name, 'Data Missing in System') carrier, NVL(j.attribute5, 'Data Missing in System') master_bill_lading, 'TSFE' || NVL(j.job_xid, ' Data Missing in System') ams_number, NVL(TRIM(cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value || ' ' || cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value), 'Data Missing in System') feeder_vessel_name, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place_loc(s.shipment_gid,cv.charter_voyage_gid,'CHARTER_VOYAGE','SCOULAR.VIA_LOCATION_ID', cv.source_location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') feeder_vessel_load_port, NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YY'), 'Data Missing in System') feeder_vessel_etd, NVL((CASE WHEN sref2.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN sref3.shipment_refnum_value ELSE sref2.shipment_refnum_value END), 'Data Missing in System') voyage_name, (CASE WHEN cvr5.charter_voyage_refnum_value IS NULL THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE (CASE WHEN (SELECT loc.location_gid FROM location loc INNER JOIN country_code cc ON loc.country_code3_gid = cc.country_code3_gid WHERE loc.location_gid = 'SCOULAR.' || REPLACE(cvr5.charter_voyage_refnum_value,'SCOULAR.','')) IS NULL THEN cvr5.charter_voyage_refnum_value ELSE (SELECT loc.city || ', ' || cc.country_name FROM location loc INNER JOIN country_code cc ON loc.country_code3_gid = cc.country_code3_gid WHERE loc.location_gid = 'SCOULAR.' || REPLACE(cvr5.charter_voyage_refnum_value,'SCOULAR.','')) END) END) load_port, NVL(cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') mother_vessel_etd, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place_loc_pr(s.shipment_gid,cv.charter_voyage_gid,'CHARTER_VOYAGE','SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VIA_PORT_OF_DISCHARGE', cv.dest_location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') discharge_port, NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YY'), 'Data Missing in System') arrival_date FROM job j LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND vsor.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT sh.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh WHERE vsor.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND sh.is_primary = 'Y' AND sh.perspective = 'B') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.perspective = 'B' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN vessel v ON cv.vessel_gid = v.vessel_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_FEEDER VESSEL NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_FEEDER VOYAGE NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr3 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr3.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_TRANSHIP PORT DEPARTURE DATE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr4 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr4.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr4.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr5 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr5.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr5.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_TRANSHIP PORT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.PLACE OF DELIVERY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.VESSEL_VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.BOOKING_VESSEL_VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact cont1 ON cv.servprov_gid = cont1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l1 ON s.source_location_gid = l1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc1 ON l1.country_code3_gid = cc1.country_code3_gid WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT DISTINCT TRIM((CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.HBL_SHIPPER_LINE1') IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_contact_desc(s.shipment_gid,'SHIPPER') IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER'), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','1') IS NULL THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','2') IS NULL THEN TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','1')) ELSE TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','1') || CHR(13) || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','2')) END) END) ELSE (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','2') IS NULL THEN TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','1')) ELSE TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','1') || CHR(13) || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','2')) END) END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER')), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER')) END) ELSE REPLACE(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_contact_desc(s.shipment_gid,'SHIPPER'),CHR(13) || CHR(13),CHR(13)) END) ELSE REPLACE(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.HBL_SHIPPER_LINE1'),CHR(13) || CHR(13),CHR(13)) END)) manufacturer_name, TRIM((CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.HBL_SHIPPER_LINE1') IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_contact_desc(s.shipment_gid,'SHIPPER') IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER'), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','1') IS NULL THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','2') IS NULL THEN TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','1')) ELSE TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','1') || CHR(13) || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','2')) END) END) ELSE (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','2') IS NULL THEN TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','1')) ELSE TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','1') || CHR(13) || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','2')) END) END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER')), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER')) END) ELSE REPLACE(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_contact_desc(s.shipment_gid,'SHIPPER'),CHR(13) || CHR(13),CHR(13)) END) ELSE REPLACE(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.HBL_SHIPPER_LINE1'),CHR(13) || CHR(13),CHR(13)) END)) shipper_name FROM job j LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND vsor.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT sh.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh WHERE vsor.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND sh.is_primary = 'Y' AND sh.perspective = 'B') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID

SELECT DISTINCT (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.HBL_CONSIGNEE_LINE1') IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_contact_desc(s.shipment_gid,'ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE'), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') END) || (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') = 'TO ORDER' THEN '' ELSE CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','1') IS NULL THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','2') IS NULL THEN TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','1')) ELSE TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','1') || CHR(13) || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','2')) END) END) ELSE (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','2') IS NULL THEN TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','1')) ELSE TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','1') || CHR(13) || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','2')) END) END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE')), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE')) END) END) ELSE REPLACE(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_contact_desc(s.shipment_gid,'ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE'), CHR(13) || CHR(13), CHR(13)) END) ELSE REPLACE(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.HBL_CONSIGNEE_LINE1'), CHR(13) || CHR(13), CHR(13)) END) consignee_name FROM job j LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND vsor.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT sh.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh WHERE vsor.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND sh.is_primary = 'Y' AND sh.perspective = 'B') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID
